name: She Already Has Someone She Likes?!
name_original: She Already Has Someone She Likes?!
description:
“Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and oftentimes we call a man cold when he is only sad.”

_______________________________

Kawamura Shizuka is the type of girl who lies awake at 2 in the morning thinking about that time in 3rd grade she accidentally called her teacher 'mom'.

In stark contrast, Ishihara Mai is almost too sure of herself, exuding confidence even when it's clear she's in the wrong.

Despite the night-and-day difference in their worldviews, these two have managed to become the best of friends, something that Shizuka is (begrudgingly) okay with...

Until she finds out that the girl who she's always thought of out-of-her-league has a crush...on who, exactly? (seriously, would it kill her to be a little less vague?!)

Like, obviously, she was never planning on confessing in the first place!!! 

But now...it's almost like Mai's forcing her hand!

Featuring: one t̶s̶u̶n̶d̶e̶r̶e̶ protagonist who takes idealism to a whole new level

A deuteragonist who's prim and proper and not at all manipulative

More clichés and tropes than you can count on two hands

_______________________________

A good 15 minutes before the deadline...record time, eh?

"She Already Has Someone She Likes?!" is a kinetic visual novel featuring long dramatic monologues about happiness, heroism, and also just gals being pals.

The total script is around 11k words; expected playtime is ~60 minutes.

Content warnings: depictions of homophobia/internalized homophobia
